title: Student Loan Giant Suffers Defeats in Court (Audio)
itunes:title: Student Loan Giant Suffers Defeats in Court (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Dalie Jimenez, professor at the University of Connecticut School of Law and founding member of the CFPB, discusses Navient Corp.'s recent courtroom losses after the student loan provider failed to block two CFPB lawsuits. She speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
